Class PenCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.neolab.sdk.pen.PenCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPenCtrl

    public class PenCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPenCtrl
    The class that provides the functionality of a pen
